embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app for Windows or Mac to simplify how you share and bookmark today.

replies.body: Oh, it looks like you died around the 3 minute mark and then AFKd until about the 17 minute mark. I think if you are AFK for too long in a match it count as a loss even if you do come back. Not sure if what the cut off is, but it feels like if you are gone for 10+ minutes, or maybe a % of the game length, it counts it as a loss regardless of outcome. I've seen that play out a few times.

Damn, your MMR must be pretty low if you still lose LP on wins!

J/k... it might be a bug from earlier when matches were being buggy. Games may have counted late?

> [{quoted}](name=EpicEzio,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=fF2hrd7v,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-07T09:09:34.915+0000)
>
> Damn, your MMR must be pretty low if you still lose LP on wins!
> 
> J/k... it might be a bug from earlier when matches were being buggy. Games may have counted late?

idk, i've only won in ranked today so idk about them counting late theory
Did you disconnect at any point during the game?

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=fF2hrd7v,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-07T08:43:09.688+0000)
>
> Did you disconnect at any point during the game?

i made it back before the remake time, so less than a minute.

> [{quoted}](name=Dominion Chi,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=fF2hrd7v,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-06-07T08:44:02.065+0000)
>
> i made it back before the remake time, so less than a minute.

submit a ticket. you deserve that lp back.
